name: Attuned_Might_of_the_Tanker_F
display_name: Attuned Might of the Tanker F
display_fullname: Boosts.Attuned Might of the Tanker F
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Gives the Tanker a chance of increasing their resistance by a small amount for 20 seconds, this effect stacks up to 3 times, and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. This effect will trigger roughly 5 times per minute. This enhancement can only be slotted by Tankers and may be slotted into any Tanker damage power.
power_display_names: Might of the Tanker: Recharge/Chance for +Res(All)
